page.title: Work Experience
page.description: Web Development and other experience, contracts and freelance work.
page.html:
Marketing Web Developer

Robert Half International - April 2023 - November 2024

type: embedded-entry-inline id: 25RKDWrzGUBF8wSHGphub3

On the FED team, I helped move content from a Drupal CMS to Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) in a fast-paced, multi-country setting. I focused on spotting design, component, and CMS issues daily, carefully writing them in detailed Jira tickets. I also looked into AEM tools to make workflows smoother, cut down on redundant tasks, and keep data updates efficient globally. Additionally, I improved page data to boost global SEO rankings, speed up loading times, and enhance indexing for better visibility and performance on search engines.

  • Dentified daily design, component, and CMS bugs; wrote Jira tickets.

  • Researched AEM tools to optimize workflows, scale tasks, and document findings.

  • Developed, organized, and transferred copy and data into components.

  • Used ACS AEM Tooling to debug and submit tickets for bugs.

    • Website

Web Developer Specialist

DigitalNEST - August 2022 - April 2023

While working for a non-profit, I coordinated interns to ensure the timely completion of WordPress projects within established timelines, budgets, and resource constraints. I also managed and maintained the company's website and its clients to guarantee optimal performance, security, and design. Additionally, I troubleshot and stabilized multiple client WordPress websites, effectively resolving issues to ensure smooth functionality and reliability.

Website

Freelance Professional Photographer

George Street Photo & Video · Freelance George Street Photo & Video · Feb 2019 - Present

As a freelance photographer, I capture stunning images tailored to my clients' wedding and portrait preferences. I produce visually appealing and imaginative photographs using various techniques and equipment. Furthermore, I enhance and retouch images using Adobe Photoshop or Lightroom to meet specifications and incorporate a unique flair that reflects the brand's color scheme. I have experience as a lead wedding photographer and a secondary shooter for companies such as Lifetouch, Gilroy Gardens, AKA, and other Bay Area businesses like Dream Splash Media and The Affinity Productions.

My Personal Photography Website

--

Frontend UI + Web App + CMS Developer

June 2019 - Present

Since June 2019, I have engaged in a transformative journey of personal and professional growth that uniquely combines my web development and photography passions across the dynamic tech hubs of San Jose, Gilroy, and Watsonville, CA. Throughout this time, I have completed various coding projects, dedicated numerous hours to obtain valuable certifications, and refined my skills in both creative and technical fields. This distinctive mix of capabilities enables me to tackle challenges and implement innovative marketing strategies along with advanced web solutions that foster business success and engage audiences.
